en: Judge me, O God, and plead my cause against an ungodly nation: Oh deliver me from the deceitful and unjust man.
hmr: Aw Pathien ro mi rêlpêk la, Pathien ngaisak naw hnam chunga hin ka thu mi hrilpêk rawh; Aw, mi hlêmhmang mi indik nawa inthawk hin mi sanhim rawh.

en: For thou art the God of my strength; why hast thou cast me off? Why go I mourning because of the oppression of the enemy?
hmr: Nang chu ka hrâtna Pathien i ni sih a, iengdinga i mi ngaitha am a na? Iengdinga a mi dotu nêksâwrna leia lungngaia kân vâi ruoi hlak am a na?

en: Oh send out thy light and thy truth; let them lead me: Let them bring me unto thy holy hill, And to thy tabernacles.
hmr: Aw, i var le i thutak chu tir suok la, anni chun mi ṭhuoi sienla, I tlâng inthieng le, I umna chu mîn tlun raw se.

en: Then will I go unto the altar of God, Unto God my exceeding joy; And upon the harp will I praise thee, O God, my God.
hmr: Chuongchun, Pathien mâichâm kâwlah fêng ka ta, Pathien ka hlimna bêk bêk kuoma chun: Aw Pathien, ka Pathien, ṭingṭangin inpâk bawk ka ti che.

en: Why art thou cast down, O my soul? And why art thou disquieted within me? Hope thou in God; for I shall yet praise him, Who is the help of my countenance, and my God.
hmr: Aw ka hringna, iengdinga i kûn zing am? Iengdinga ka sûnga hin i buoi am a na? Pathien beisei rawh, ama chu ka lân pâk ding a ni sih a. Ka hmêl sukmawitu le ka Pathien chu.
